document.full_text: federal firefighters toiled with hand tools in rugged west texas terrain to cut off a fast moving fire that had consumed 150,000 acres, authorities said on saturday.
document.title: firefighters battle texas wildfire with hand tools
lines_and_colors: federal firefighters toiled with hand tools in rugged west texas terrain to cut off a fast moving fire that had consumed 150,000 acres, authorities said on saturday.
